# Divine Blessing (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 immediate action

**Components:** V, S, F

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 1 round/3 levels

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Champions of Valor (WotC), pg. 55

This spell creates a glistening aura of golden magical energy around the target creature. The creature gains a +2 luck bonus to AC.

*Focus:* A gold piece.

**GM Note**

*House Rule*: Name changed from *favor of Tymora* to *divine blessing* for continuity.

*House Rule*: In the Forgotten Realms this spell is commonly known as *favor of Tymora*.

*House Rule*: Level changed to Cleric 2, if Initiate feats are used, change back to Initiate of Tymora 2.
